definition: a fastener that serves to join or connect, make a logical or causal connection
details:
noun
- a fastener that serves to join or connect
= example: a fastener that serves to join or connect
= synonyms: linkup, tie, tie-in
- an interconnecting circuit between two or more locations for the purpose of transmitting and receiving data
= synonyms: data link
- a two-way radio communication system (usually microwave)
= synonyms: radio link
- a channel for communication between groups
= synonyms: contact
- an instruction that connects one part of a program or an element on a list to another program or list as in computing
= example: an instruction that connects one part of a program or an element on a list to another program or list as in computing
- a unit of length equal to 1/100 of a chain
- the means of connection between things linked in series
= synonyms: nexus
- a connecting shape
= synonyms: connection
- the state of being connected
= synonyms: connection
verb
- make a logical or causal connection
= synonyms: associate, colligate, tie in, relate, link up, connect
- connect, fasten, or put together two or more pieces
= synonyms: tie, link up, connect
- link with or as with a yoke
= synonyms: yoke
- be or become joined or united or linked
= synonyms: join, unite, link up, connect
